actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 10:00 a.m. on February 17, 2023.

actions-list.header: Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Pandemic
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 4(a)(1)(B)(1) of H. Res. 5, 118th Congress, as amended by section 1(d) of H. Res. 78, 118th Congress, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Pandemic: Mr. Bera and Ms. Tokuda.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Brian K. Fitzpatrick to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
